E-Mail Messages
Date: Thursday, 6/19/1989
Subject: Kenneth Howse learns new position
Kenneth Howse has made noteable progress
learning his new position, Centerfield.
I would rate his skills as "E" right now.

Regards,
Your scouting director



Date: Monday, 6/23/1989
Subject: Progress of Tobias Huertas
Dear Sir,
Tobias Huertas has an AVG of .321 at AA Sticky Wicketts!
I believe he is ready for the next level!

Regards,
Scouting Director



Date: Thursday, 7/17/1989
Subject: Louis Jackson injured
Hello Manager,
he had a little fight in a bar, and got knocked out.
Diagnosis: Knocked Out Teeth.
He is day-to-day, but full recovery will take 3 days.

Regards,
Team Doctor



Date: Friday, 7/25/1989
Subject: Trade offer
Dear Sir,
I would like to offer you following trade:

in return for
SP Eric Owings, SP Alberto Saez.

Please let me know if you accept!

Best Regards,
Malibu GM
